alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 6:56AM MST until January 28 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Fernwood, Fourth Of July Pass, Mullan, Dobson Pass, Pinehurst, Kellogg, Lookout Pass, St. Maries, Wallace, and Osburn. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. In addition, gusty winds on Saturday may lead to areas of blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rapidly falling temperatures will accompany the snowfall this morning.
info.instruction: If you travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
